name: Letting the Cat out of the Dryer
name_original: Letting the Cat out of the Dryer
description:
A Cat stumbles into a portal inside of a Tumble Dryer, and is suddenly inside of a parallel house. The portal disintergrates and now they must search for the next portal to continue onwards. How far can the cat go, before it misses a portal and gets stuck in a specific universe?

Use Arrow Keys, or WAD to move the cat.

This Game was made for the LM0B Beginners Game Jam # 20

Many features had to be cut out, including sound.  Expect bugs, and really limited rooms.

All Assets are created by Ferrz

Sound heard at the begining created with BXFR
